Affliction.name: Clamped arteries
Affliction.description: Bleeding from artery has been stopped temporarily

Affliction.name: Clamped arteries
Affliction.description: Bleeding from artery has been stopped temporarily

Affliction.name: Clamped arteries
Affliction.description: Bleeding from artery has been stopped temporarily

Affliction.name: Clamped arteries
Affliction.description: Bleeding from artery has been stopped temporarily

Affliction.name: Clamped arteries
Affliction.description: Bleeding from artery has been stopped temporarily

Affliction.name: Clamped arteries
Affliction.description: Bleeding from artery has been stopped temporarily

Affliction.name: Needle in chest
Affliction.description: Normalizes the pressure in the pleural cavity

OxygenLow.name: Oxygen low
OxygenLow.description: The skin is pale and clammy, and the lips turning blue.

Bloodloss.name: Bloodloss
Bloodloss.description: The patient is pale and cold. Their heart beats in an alarmingly rapid fashion.

Affliction.name: Morbusine poisoning
Affliction.description: The patient can't breathe at all, and their heartrate is slowing rapidly.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of morbusine poisoning.

Affliction.name: Cyanide poisoning
Affliction.description: The patient is confused and has trouble breathing. Their skin is red and they have occasional muscle spasms.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of cyanide poisoning.

Affliction.name: Sufforin Poisoning
Affliction.description: Without prompt treatment, sufforine poisoning leads to delusions and rapid death.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of sufforin poisoning.

Bleeding.name: Bleeding
Bleeding.description: Blood pours freely from this ragged and particularly nasty open wound

Bleeding.name: Bleeding
Bleeding.description: Blood pours freely from this ragged and particularly nasty open wound

InternalDamage.name: Internal Damage
InternalDamage.description: The area is an ugly shade of purple, and apparently very painful to touch. You suspect a bone might be broken.
InternalDamage.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to your internal injuries.

InternalDamage.name: Bite wounds
InternalDamage.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been mauled to death.

InternalDamage.name: Gunshot wound
InternalDamage.description: The entry site is a small, dark, bruised hole oozing a little blood. The exit wound however is a large ragged mess of exposed tissue and pouring blood.
InternalDamage.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of gunshot wounds.

Burn.name: Burn
Burn.description: The area is blistered and red, and skin is already beginning to peel away in sheets. The patient is in a great deal of pain.

Affliction.name: Opiate overdose
Affliction.description: The patient has pinpoint pupils and icy cold skin. They struggle to breathe and swallow.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have died of opiate overdose.

Affliction.name: Hemotransfusion Shock
Affliction.description: The patient experiences mental agitation, vague anxiety. Constricting breath pains in the chest. shortness of breath, feeling of lack of air

Affliction.name: Coma
Affliction.description: The patient is in a coma

Affliction.name: Ruptured face
Affliction.description: The patient has problems with eating and speaking

Affliction.name: Foreign body
Affliction.description: Foreign bodies are stuck inside

Affliction.name: Traumatic amputation
Affliction.description: Most of the tissue of the right arm was torn off

Affliction.name: Traumatic amputation
Affliction.description: Most of the tissue of the left arm was torn off

Affliction.name: Traumatic amputation
Affliction.description: Most of the tissue of the right leg was torn off

Affliction.name: Traumatic amputation
Affliction.description: Most of the tissue of the left leg was torn off

Affliction.name: Traumatic amputation
Affliction.description: Most of the tissue of the head was torn off

Affliction.name: Amputation
Affliction.description: The right arm was surgically amputated

Affliction.name: Amputation
Affliction.description: The left arm was surgically amputated

Affliction.name: Amputation
Affliction.description: The right leg was surgically amputated

Affliction.name: Amputation
Affliction.description: The left leg was surgically amputated

Affliction.name: Amputation
Affliction.description: The head was surgically amputated

Affliction.name: Spinal cord injury
Affliction.description: The patient is paralyzed, and does not feel the body
Affliction.causeofdeathdescription: Сouldn't stand the hardships of life
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You сouldn't withstand the hardships of life

Affliction.name: Cardiac tamponade
Affliction.description: As a result of a heart wound, blood accumulates in the pericardium and squeezes the heart

Affliction.name: Pneumothorax
Affliction.description: It is difficult for the patient to breathe, the sound of snow is heard when touching the chest

Affliction.name: Eventration
Affliction.description: The content of abdomen comes out of the wound, it seems that the patient is not very pleased

Affliction.name: Internal bleeding
Affliction.description: The patient has blood loss and vomiting with blood

Affliction.name: Respiratory arrest
Affliction.description: The patient is not breathing
